**Hold down** on the share arrow ‚û°Ô∏è, **drag your finger** to the chat where you want to forward the message and **release**.

New settings for gifts allow you to **display a gift icon** üéÅ in the message bar, select whose gifts **automatically appear** on your profile ‚Äì or choose the **types of gifts** you can receive from others.

[1](https://t.me/telegram/377) ‚Ä¢¬†[2](https://t.me/telegram/378) ‚Ä¢ **3** ‚Ä¢¬†[4](https://t.me/telegram/380) ‚Ä¢¬†[More](https://t.me/telegram/381)

**Group Calls: Encryption Emoji.**
Telegram calls are protected by **end-to-end encryption**, which can be easily verified by **comparing the emoji** that appear on screen.

If the emoji match for all participants, the call is **100% secure.** In group calls, the **emoji will update** any time someone joins or leaves.

Telegram's secure 1-on-1 calls can now be **easily expanded** to hold **up to 200 users**.

You can **add users** directly to an active call ‚Äì¬†or have them **join** **with a link** or QR code.

[1](https://t.me/telegram/357) ‚Ä¢¬†[2](https://t.me/telegram/358) ‚Ä¢¬†[3](https://t.me/telegram/359) ‚Ä¢¬†[4](https://t.me/telegram/360) ‚Ä¢¬†**5** ‚Ä¢ [6](https://t.me/telegram/362) ‚Ä¢ [7](https://t.me/telegram/363) ‚Ä¢ [8](https://t.me/telegram/364) ‚Ä¢¬†[9](https://t.me/telegram/365) ‚Ä¢¬†[More](https://t.me/telegram/366)

Third-party services are now able to assign **extra verification icons** to user accounts, mini apps and public chats ‚Äì¬†which will help **prevent scams** and **reduce misinformation**.

[1](https://t.me/telegram/357) ‚Ä¢¬†[2](https://t.me/telegram/358) ‚Ä¢¬†**3** ‚Ä¢¬†[4](https://t.me/telegram/360) ‚Ä¢¬†[5](https://t.me/telegram/361) ‚Ä¢ [6](https://t.me/telegram/362) ‚Ä¢ [7](https://t.me/telegram/363) ‚Ä¢ [8](https://t.me/telegram/364) ‚Ä¢¬†[9](https://t.me/telegram/365) ‚Ä¢¬†[More](https://t.me/telegram/366)

January Features
[1](https://t.me/telegram/357) ‚Ä¢¬†**2** ‚Ä¢¬†[3](https://t.me/telegram/359) ‚Ä¢¬†[4](https://t.me/telegram/360) ‚Ä¢¬†[5](https://t.me/telegram/361) ‚Ä¢ [6](https://t.me/telegram/362) ‚Ä¢ [7](https://t.me/telegram/363) ‚Ä¢ [8](https://t.me/telegram/364) ‚Ä¢¬†[9](https://t.me/telegram/365) ‚Ä¢¬†[More](https://t.me/telegram/366)

When you upgrade a gift it unlocks a **new appearance** from dozens of **custom variations** made by Telegram artists, as well as random **secondary traits**.

Collectible gifts can be **transferred** to other users or **auctioned** on NFT marketplaces.
